base_description: Tall, rectangular, gray cabinet with four drawers.
part_description: Four horizontal drawers stacked vertically, each with a handle. The cabinet is rectangular, with drawers of equal width and varying heights, positioned symmetrically on the front.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out of the cabinet structure, guided by internal tracks. The handles facilitate pulling the drawers open, while the tracks ensure smooth movement and alignment. The drawers rest securely within the cabinet when closed, preventing unintended opening.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or in a corner, interacting with surrounding furniture. Users can pull the drawers open using the handles to store or retrieve items. The flat top surface may hold additional objects, interacting as a supporting surface.
